label: ham
subject:
Re: [PATCH] LOOKUP_NAME_EXPLICIT to avoid lockups between winbindd
	and nscd
body: There is still in Europe one country capable of being given laws--Corsica. The valour and persistency with which that brave people has regained and defended its liberty well deserves that some wise man should teach it how to preserve what it has won. I have a feeling that some day that little island will astonish Europe.
